text: @piersmorgan @FT You’re absolutely incredulous . They’ve now added in care home and community that you’ve been asking for over the last few weeks. If you heard you’d have heard him say of those tested for Coronavirus - not those who sadly died and maybe had it. Hence you have estimates not facts
